website_summaries.verdict: Good size and design of board allows it to work well for kids and adults alike.
pros: Beveled edge ensures it will stay low in the water and provide better balance
Sturdy hook at the front makes for easy towing
Safety strap and base have padding to make you more comfortable as you ride
cons: Durability and build quality are questionable, as plastic may crack

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: Great knee board! Just tried it out on the lakes in northern Wisconsin. Our boys, 10 and 12, have never water skiid or knee boarded, so we were excited to try this. It took them 3 tries each before they were able to get up and enjoy it. They said it was much better than tubing. The trick was to start on the tummy and as the boat takes off, quickly push up onto your knees. Then the boat could speed up. No instructions came with this board which was a bummer, but one of my sons watched a few videos on YouTube which helped a lot. They can't wait to get back out and use this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhh so so
customer_reviews.text: First the padding on this board is ROCK hard. I have at least 15 bruises from this weekend on the lake bc the way the shin and knee cutouts hit my legs. I am 5'5" and weight 115lbs.. I received the board with no decals so its just black.. not that big of a deal but its like I got an unfinished product. It rode okay and was easy to get up on so for that I gave it 3 stars. If it weren't such a pain to send back I would def buy one that has better padding.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Amering

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made,  stay clear of this one a
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a chance to take the board out for a run until 33 days after purchase. It is unfortunate that I only have 30 days to return this, I wish I had tested it sooner. What a disappointment. The board worked great for the first 2 hours, but then one fall into the water, and the plastic slot that holds the knee strap in place broke clear of the board. There are now two holes where the screws went into the board. You can see the plastic anchors broke clear off of the board. Not very well made if after 1 fall, the board starts to break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love this!! It's super easy for the people who have never knee boarded, and also I can have a great time with it! It makes learning extremely easy with the notch in front for the tow handle. Lots of fun and smiles all around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul/Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Good for beginner to intermediate rider
customer_reviews.text: The grand nieces and nephew. Love it. Good for beginner to intermediate rider. Three kids went from beginner to intermediate in two sessions. Outstanding value!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Should be called a shinboard
customer_reviews.text: Did the engineers even kneel on this board? All pressure is on the shins. Your knees dont even hit the knee wells
customer_reviews.author: TheGrotes

customer_reviews.title: 8 & 10 loved it! Neither boy had ever tried to kneeboard ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came in two days through Amazon Prime. It was on time, appropriately packaged, and as described. We have used it once and my two boys, 8 & 10 loved it! Neither boy had ever tried to kneeboard before, and both were up on their first try and had a blast. The rope hold on the front was great for them because, as beginners, they didn't have to worry as much about holding the rope and pulling themselves up on the board at the same time. Great starter board and the price seemed reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 yr old son. He's 4'9 and about 78lb. It worked out great. Him and his friends all did really well with this board as beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Value board - for kids only!
customer_reviews.text: I would caution anyone that would like to use this board for other than small kids. Purchased this last July but the kids did not want to try it out. Had the opportunity this past weekend to finally us it and after the first wipeout the bracket for the strap broke and board bent on the top side of the knee padding. The rider was a 200lb adult going about 20mph on water.
customer_reviews.author: JT78

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first try :(
customer_reviews.text: Took out the knee board first trip it broke! Very disappointed. The attachment where the belt goes snapped off on the first crash, literally was the first ride and crash. Not sure if I got a bad one or what but I would stay away from this. Just FYI
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great starter ( or more advanced kneeboard)
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as advertised. Heavy duty strap, easy to get up and ride. Not sure how decals will hold up since they are not painted on but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It came right away and was as advertised. It was identical to the one the local boat shop was selling but it was $40 less. It has a swall bracket on the front of the board that a ski rope handle hooks onto so it's easy for my 6 year old to use it as a boogy board and within a few runs he could switch from his belly to his knees and then pick up the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: although they are easily found on YouTube
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and can't wait to hit the river. I think they might include some beginner instructions, although they are easily found on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Kroderi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 11 yo and he loves it. Great with the handle holder on the board to help newbies get on their knees and get the strap set. Then they can pick up the handle. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robroy

customer_reviews.title: Nice board.
customer_reviews.text: We are just learning to use it. It seems like a nice quality board, and should be a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price on these boards, haven't used them yet because of cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We have used it several times over the past 3 years and it's just as great as the day we first used it!
customer_reviews.author: Kati Reed

customer_reviews.title: works well I have nothing to compare it to but the kids like it.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, works well I have nothing to compare it to but the kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Had so much fun this summer on this knee board!! what a great ride!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted but only lasting a year is ...
customer_reviews.text: After having only a year the side plastic strap holder completely pulled out and broke. Now we have to spend another $100 plus for a new one. It was great while it lasted but only lasting a year is a bit of a bummer. I will look at another brand for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Strap not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Piece holding strap broke on first day on the water. Disappointed to say the least
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knee board
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knee board. The notch at the front makes it super easy to get up. wonderful feature. My 8 year old got up on his first try!
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is fun for the whole family. Anyone with knee issues, like me, can use it to body surf!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On the second use the black piece that holds the ...
customer_reviews.text: On the second use the black piece that holds the rope, completely ripped out of the board. I could not return the item as it was just past the return date. I tried contacting the seller about replacing the part or repairing/exchanging it and never received a response. Very disappointing considering my child paid for it with his own money.
customer_reviews.author: Rehaber1

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and great for kids
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and easy to get up on. my boys ages 12 and 14 use it.
customer_reviews.author: dgorno

customer_reviews.title: I bought it as a gift for my granddaughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my granddaughter. There was nothing wrong with the kneeboard, she just likes her tube better
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really quickly. We used it for our 10 and 12 year old boys, as well as my moderately sized husband. Every got used to it quickly and it suited our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jet Ski
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my 8 year old grandson. We pull the board behind our Jet Skis.
customer_reviews.author: A good guy

customer_reviews.title: Fun time with a fun product!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to work with- the kids ages 10-15 were able to get up on the board easily and had a great time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knee board for the whole family and pleased with my purchase of the Driftsun Kneeboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Family loved it, used several times this summer! Received fast, and met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: This was a really big hit this summer at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a really big hit this summer at the lake. It is high quality and is something anyone can use for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knee board and easy to use. Everyone that tried got up first time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Bought for my son's 9th birthday. Very easy for him and my 8 yr old to use, they are only 50 & 60 lbs. The strap is good length for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size board, perfect for teens. The knee area is nicely padded too.
customer_reviews.author: David Proksch

customer_reviews.title: This knee board was perfect for our 10 year old grandson just learning to ...
customer_reviews.text: This knee board was perfect for our 10 year old grandson just learning to kneeboard. His older cousins were also able to use. Exactly what we wanted. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... piece that holds the strap pulled out I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I also purchased this knee board the black piece that holds the strap pulled out I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kneeboard! The hook on the front was perfect for holding the handle of the tow rope, our kids gained confidence quickly. It wasn't long before they could reach for the handle and kneeboard like pros.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. They both got up on the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. They both got up on the first try no problem. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Laughman

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with this board
customer_reviews.text: Solid board! On my 2nd season with it and no issues. We are happy with this board.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The kids loved it although a very large kid would need a bigger board. But great for up to about 130 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it and are always wanting to go to the lake
customer_reviews.author: SandraBlanford

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Kids 13 and 15 loved this board, for the money it was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and up to small adults
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners and up to small adults. Some of the reviews said that it is fine for adults, but it was not long enough for me, and I'm only 5'8 and 175 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after first use on the water. I would not but this again
customer_reviews.author: Emiliz Yacinthe

customer_reviews.title: Good board, but I like wake boarding more
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Only complaint is that the blue padding material can kind of hurt your knees and elbows when you're trying to get up(but maybe I'm just a baby). I prefer wake boarding over knee boarding. I did not use the handle holder at the front, for some reason it gave me a little fear that if I did and nose dived, the board would pull to the bottom of the lake, maybe not, but I feared it might so I didn't use that feature. again, overall good quality I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Zech

customer_reviews.title: ... 12 AND THIS KNEEBOARD HAS REALLY BEEN ALOT OF FUN THEY ALL CAME UP AND LEARNED TO RIDE IT ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE 7 GRAND KIDS AND THEY ARE ALL ABOUT 7 AND 8 YEARS OLD AND ONE 12 AND THIS KNEEBOARD HAS REALLY BEEN ALOT OF FUN THEY ALL CAME UP AND LEARNED TO RIDE IT IN ONE DAY IT IS A GREAT VALUE AND IT WILL COMPETE WITH THE 200.00 ONE'S MY SON AND WIFE SHE IS 54 AND THEY CAN CUT UP ON IT IT HANDLES VERY GOOD TO JUMP WAVES AND DO 360 DEGREE CIRCLE'S AS WELL GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Deer Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned for the price I was going to be disappointed. Turned out that I had nothing to worry about. This board was a great hit with all of the family at this years family reunion on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Kneeboard, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived quickly and just in time for our big lake weekend! Kudos on the prompt order time. Quality knee board for any level of rider from beginner to advanced. Light weight and had great control. (Easy to maneuver and control when doing/attempting your tricks) The hook for the handle to assist in getting up onto the board was very helpful to our new riders. Everyone was able to get up on the board with ease and cruise around without hesitation. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Adults had a great time on this thing as well
customer_reviews.text: We bought several towable types for this July 4th weekend, and of all them, this one was the biggest hit by far. Two 14 year olds (one boy and one girl) and a 12 year old girl had a blast. The tow handle catch at the front was a big help in getting them up and on top of the water (and when their arms got tired). Adults had a great time on this thing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This made for lots of fun and no frustration
customer_reviews.text: The tow on the front of the board meant my daughters, and their friends, were able to get up on the board on their first try with less than 60 seconds of instruction! This made for lots of fun and no frustration. Even their father (at over 200 pounds) was able to enjoy using the board. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M Davidson

customer_reviews.title: works great for beginers as well as seasoned riders
customer_reviews.text: works great for beginers as well as seasoned riders..... keep in mind young lite riders should not strap in as it may over turn and stay upside down.
customer_reviews.author: russell hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: The stickers had air bubbles all over underneath them. The foam knee pad was scratched, and will easily scratch in storage or in use. The board looks like it was a craft project of a child. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY, BROKE THE FIRST TIME I USED IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knee board expecting it to be made of a durable material, however it was just the opposite. The first time I used it, the front of the board bent and cracked the plastic. I would never buy this again and never recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Schornack

customer_reviews.title: Built cheap
customer_reviews.text: Received this board 5 days ago, left it in my covered boat out of the sun. Got it out to use it today and the foam is peeling off the top around the edges, haven't even used it yet!!! Paid good money for a cheap product
customer_reviews.author: Chad R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and in great condition! Great product even if the riders were ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in great condition! Great product even if the riders were not successful on the first day out. If only this board gave one athletic ability as well! We plan for many good times with this. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a shin-board, look no ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a shin-board, look no further. This board was intended for people that do NOT have straight shins. The knee pockets are very deep, so when you kneel on the board, feel free to store your beverage down in the pocket where your knee goes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike jz

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice board. I hadn't been on a kneeboard in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice board. I hadn't been on a kneeboard in several years and was able to ride this board first try. Easy to maneuver and is pretty comfortable. The rope holder on front of board is a plus also. Great board for price.
customer_reviews.author: shawn wallen

customer_reviews.title: huge family disappointment..
customer_reviews.text: Strap pulled out through the plastic on first pull this weekend and completely broken with our new boat...huge family disappointment ...Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to get up on for beginners and was stable ...
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to get up on for beginners and was stable in the water. Great for kids and adults. I am 41 about 285 and I even managed to ride it. I would recommend this board to anyone seeking a good all around board at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Its a great starter board
customer_reviews.text: Its a great starter board. comfortable on the knees. Its a bit small for an adult but the pros in the family were doing 360's and getting air on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy knee boarding!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! The board is a bit bigger than some others I have used, so it makes getting up even easier. One thing is that the board is slightly thinner than others I have used, so cutting across the water is slightly trickier. Overall I would buy this again - the knee padding is great, and the strap is nice and long.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H. Pfister

customer_reviews.title: Great for Variety of Ages
customer_reviews.text: My children range in age from 10-17 and all of them enjoy riding this kneeboard. No soreness in the knees after a long ride as the board is very comfortable. The strap is wide - slightly padded which makes it easy for the children to get strapped in with comfort. Great value!!!
customer_reviews.author: King of Wadley

product_meta.title: Driftsun Kneeboard with Hook for Kids and Adults, Includes Boating Strap and Hook, Knee-Board Water-Sports, 50-Inches x 20-Inches
feature_bullets: DURABLE: 3/4" EVA foam padding for comfort
FEATURES: Integrated hook at front of board to help beginners take off easier rather than wasting most of their energy trying to get up.
CONTROL: Bevel Edge keeps board low in the water making maneuvering and cutting easier and faster
COMFORTABLE: 3" Inch Padded strap for stability without losing comfort
VERSATILE: This board is perfect for beginners and advanced riders adults and children alike
